Glendale.New Village Girls Academy: New Village Girls Academy is an all-girls, college preparatory charter school, which opened in September 2006 with grades 9 and 10. For the school year beginning in September 2007, 11th grade was added; 12th grade was added the following year. New Village’s goal is that all graduating seniors will be well prepared to either apply to a four- or two-year college; to enroll in vocational training; or to enter directly into the world of work.
